refined_clusters.merge_reason: Merged cluster_001 and cluster_002 due to very high semantic similarity (>0.85) and strong overlap in topic (EcoBloom campaign), participants, channel, and thread (thread_001). Also absorbed EcoBloom-related messages (11–13) from cluster_003 after splitting.
refined_clusters.split_reason: Split cluster_003 to separate out EcoBloom thread_001 updates (msgs 11–13) from the distinct FitFusion thread_002 topic.
Separated from cluster_003 because it is a distinct project in a different thread (thread_002) with its own scope and deadline (Aug 15, 2025).
